title: 1 bedroom 1 bathroom (T suite) - Dorchester Village Apartments
posting_body: Reply to this listing for more information.
Discover all of the elements of a great community with Dorchester village Apartments.
Thank you for your interest in our community.
If you’re looking for a great looking affordable apartment then we are the residence for you!The Unique location in Richmond Heights is Just Minutes away are the interstates 90 and 271.
Convenient to Downtown Cleveland and all the east side suburbs (Highland Woods, Willoughby Hills, Wickliffe, Beachwood, Mayfield Heights).
All Tenants have access to all amenities.
The amenities include large outdoor pool, and picnic and grill areas with playgrounds on the property.
Our buildings include elevators, workout facility, laundry room handicapped access and a host of other features which care for your special needs.
Our Staff are here to make your time and residence a great positive experience.
